#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>

#define lld long long int
#define d int
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    lld num,i,t;
    lld a[20];
    a[0]=2;
    for(i=1; i<=19; i++)
    {
        if(i%2==1)
          a[i]=a[i-1]*2-1;
          else
           a[i]=a[i-1]*2+1;
    }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>num;
        cout<<a[num-1]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
